ygData.subject: Re: Lost
ygData.msgSnippet: A small genteel giggle came from her as he held her close. Such delights never before paid attention to. Should they or should they not? They were after all

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

A small genteel giggle came from her as he held her close. Such delights 
never before paid attention to. Should they or should they not? They were after 
all Decepticons... well, she was... he was supposedly Predacon... however, parts 
of him once were Decepticon... so, she classified him as such. 

No, she wouldn't care any more, she would let such emotions show.. but only 
to him. Towards others, she would appear the harsh, rough, battle hardened 
Decepticon. But to him... she would be that warrior mixed with the most rare soft &
 gentle side towards only him. 

In his embrace, she nuzzled against his chest & shoulder. As mind numbing & 
strange as it was, she welcomed it now. "Mmmm.... just... a moment away from 
the strenous chores of being a Decepticon. It's best kept in grand company such 
as yours." 

Resting her head upon his chest, at the base of his neck, she turned serious. 
"I have been waiting for this for many a millenia," her voice soft but 
serious. "I would do anything for you." & she did... proving it over & over. (As 
this is done many times in other RPGs)

Looking up at him with her crimson optics, her one hand came up to touch the 
side of his face that was Megatron, gently & slowly. "I do love you. Ever 
since I first gazed upon you with my optics," she confessed.

--part1_a.31d7ace8.2c200ddc_boundary
